item.title: Hosting and hiding your C2 with Docker and Socat
item.description: Abstract Setup ðŸ”§ Docker Socat Metasploit Running the delivery chain ðŸ’¥ Delivering and communicating with https ðŸ”’ Notes Abstract Using Docker, we want to run a simple C2 that is not exposed to the internet, with multiple socats redirecting our payload delivery and session handling correctly. All this with the help of docker. It’s straightforward once you’ve gotten the grip. We wish to keep our C2 container in a segmented Docker network.
